      • retrieveRGBAData

        public static int[][][] retrieveRGBAData(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi)
        Obtains the RGB pixel data of an image, as well as the alpha data. If there is no alpha data, it returns only the RGB channel data.
        Parameters:
        bi -
        Returns:

      • retrievePixelData

        public static int[][][] retrievePixelData(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi,
                                          boolean procureAlphaIfPossible)
        Returns the pixel data of an image in array. Permits specifying whether alpha information is desired or not.
        Parameters:
        bi - input image
        procureAlphaIfPossible - whether you want the alpha channel or not
        Returns:
        an int array of the image data

      • readSingleImageFromPath

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage readSingleImageFromPath(java.lang.String path)
                                                            throws InvalidRequestException
        Fast-fail read-in of a buffered image file from a given String path. Exits immediately upon read-in failure.
        Parameters:
        path - string pointing to target file
        Returns:
        BufferedImage at path location
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException

        Reads in an animated gif file.
        Parameters:
        path - string path pointing to file
        Returns:
        gif formatted object representing input file
        Throws:
